snippet: LeBron James had 30 points, eight rebounds and seven assists, and the Miami Heat avoided a winless season in the Big Apple with a 106-91 victory Saturday night that snapped the New York Knicks' four-game winning streak....

headline.print_headline: James, Heat Snap Knicks' Streak at 4, 106-91
headline.main: James, Heat Snap Knicks' Streak at 4, 106-91

lead_paragraph: LeBron James had 30 points, eight rebounds and seven assists, and the Miami Heat avoided a winless season in the Big Apple with a 106-91 victory Saturday night that snapped the New York Knicks' four-game winning streak.
